verses.verse: I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> at all <S%H6256>times.<s%> His <S%H8416>praise<s%> will always be in my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H1984>boast<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> The <S%H6035>humble<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> of <S%H8055>it,<s%> and be glad.
Oh <S%H1431>magnify<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with <S%H7311>me.<s%> Let us exalt his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>
I <S%H1875>sought<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and he <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H5337>me,<s%> and delivered me from all my <S%H4035>fears.<s%>
They <S%H5027>looked<s%> to <S%H5102>him,<s%> and were radiant. Their <S%H6440>faces<s%> shall never be covered with <S%H2659>shame.<s%>
This poor <S%H6041>man<s%> <S%H7121>cried,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3467>him,<s%> and saved him out of all his <S%H6869>troubles.<s%>
The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2583>encamps<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> those who <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H2502>him,<s%> and delivers them.
Oh <S%H2938>taste<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H2896>good.<s%> <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> who takes refuge in <S%H2620>him.<s%>
Oh <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you his <S%H6918>saints,<s%> for there is no <S%H4270>lack<s%> with those who fear <S%H3373>him.<s%>
The young <S%H3715>lions<s%> do <S%H7326>lack,<s%> and suffer <S%H7456>hunger,<s%> but those who <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall not <S%H2637>lack<s%> any good <S%H2896>thing.<s%>
<S%H3212>Come,<s%> you <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H3925>me.<s%> I will teach you the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Who is <S%H376>someone<s%> who <S%H2655>desires<s%> <S%H2416>life,<s%> and <S%H157>loves<s%> many <S%H3117>days,<s%> that he may <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2896>good?<s%>
<S%H5341>Keep<s%> your <S%H3956>tongue<s%> from <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and your <S%H8193>lips<s%> from <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H4820>lies.<s%>
<S%H5493>Depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and pursue <S%H7291>it.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are toward the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%> His <S%H241>ears<s%> listen to their <S%H7775>cry.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H6440>face<s%> is against those who <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> their <S%H2143>memory<s%> from the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
The righteous <S%H6817>cry,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8085>hears,<s%> and <S%H5337>delivers<s%> them out of all their <S%H6869>troubles.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> to those who have a <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H3467>saves<s%> those who have a <S%H1793>crushed<s%> <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
<S%H7227>Many<s%> are the <S%H7451>afflictions<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> delivers him out of them <S%H5337>all.<s%>
He <S%H8104>protects<s%> all of his <S%H6106>bones.<s%> Not <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H2007>them<s%> is <S%H7665>broken.<s%>
<S%H7451>Evil<s%> shall <S%H4191>kill<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%> Those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be <S%H816>condemned.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6299>redeems<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants.<s%> None of those who take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in him shall be <S%H816>condemned.<s%>
